I have played 2000 hours of this game and have not even completed all the achievements. Out of the 2k hours played I would say that maybe 4 or 5 hours were spent having fun. The rest was just awful. The experience would be considerably better if Volvo added the best map of all time back into the active duty maps. I am talking about Cobblestone. When Assault and Militia were removed as the hostage maps I cried, even though I spend 4 times more game time queuing for these maps than actually playing them.
Also 85% of players in ANZ are in silver. Gabe plz fix. Ty
BEST SKINS AND MATCHES WITHOUT CHEATERS

Играть в CS:GO — всё равно что сходить на встречу выпускников. Сразу заметны изменения: постарели, постриглись, переоделись, в конце концов. Но это даже доставляет удовольствие: это ведь всё те же люди, которых вы знали!
